page.title: 10FOREIGN PUPIL AT SCHOOL
page.content: Noriko Yamamoto is a foreign student attending Abbotsholme Independent school. She is 17 years old and her home is in Japan.She is happy at Abbotsholme although she thought the weather was very miserable in comparison to Japan,and in this respect she prefers Japan.She enjoys the countryside and finds the British people friendly and cheerful. She watches English sport and on the whole she likes English food, especially chips, as well as English fashion and music.She does not watch English television as she thinks it is boring. Norikos parents have now obtained work in Canada so she will be going to school in America.She says she will miss England and her friends from school.She hopes to pass her exams in America and return to Japan as soon as possible.
